extension.officialTitle: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2016 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.
extension.action: Mr. McCain (for himself and Mr. Reed) (by request) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services
